response.overview: A snowboard film directed by Kevin Sansalone and Clayton Larsen. See some of snowboarding's brightest up and comers and veteran pros as they film over the 2009/2010 season. The film covers a wide spectrum of snowboarding, from backcountry helicopter shoots and massive park jump sessions to urban/rail riding. Shot on location in Whistler, Vancouver, Alberta Rockies, Calgary, Edmonton, Toronto, California, New York, Japan and The DC Mountain Lab in Utah.
response.title: Now You Know
